ASŌ Tarō (1940-), Japanese entrepreneur and LDP politician, prime minister from 2008

sentences.english: And Japanese former(foreign) minister Taro Aso said mister Abe may visit China as early as October.
sentences.chinese: 日本外相麻生太郎称安倍会在十月初访问中国。

sentences.english: Mr Watanabe has been a leading critic of Mr Aso's fiscal policy.
sentences.chinese: 渡边喜美一直是麻生太郎财政政策的主要批评者。

sentences.english: Both Mr. Aso and Ms. Koike are staunch Washington supporters. Last year, Ms.
sentences.chinese: 麻生和小池都是华盛顿的坚定支持者。

sentences.english: Late last week Prime Minister Aso gave one foolish answer.
sentences.chinese: 上周，日本首相麻生太郎给出一个愚蠢的答案。

definition: Koizumi (name)/KOIZUMI Jun'ichirō, Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2001-2006
